Paper-less attendance system using QR code, NFC chips, BLR etc. 2. Developing an anti-counterfeiting system using Qr code, Geotag, Artificial Intelligence etc. 3. Centralizedâ€¦ Show more

honors_and_awards.title: Runner Up: Smart India Hackathon (Via Ministry of Education, India)
honors_and_awards.publication: MHRD India In Association of Smart India Hackathon
honors_and_awards.description: Represented IIT Delhi in Pan India Hackathon; won 75K INR prize money (2017) Role: Team Lead & Technical Lead cum operation & management - Developed an Anti-counterfeiting system for NCERT books using QR-Code, MySQL & Naive Bayes Algorithm - Secured 1st runner-up among 10k teams participated in the competition; awarded the best innovative idea Under MHRD and the proposal has been sent for implementation in NCERT Books in India
